mapper.select: SELECT equipment_name AS equipmentName, parent_stock_code AS parentStockCode, staff_name AS staffName, rent_flg AS rentFlg, start_date AS startDate, limit_date AS limitDate, confirmed_date AS confirmedDate, remarks AS remarks FROM equip_detail_view WHERE equipment_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND rent_flg = '可'
SELECT staff_no AS staffNo, name AS name, auth_no AS authNo, del AS del FROM staff_data
mapper.update: UPDATE stock_data SET staff_no = #{staffNo}, start_date = #{startDate}, limit_date = #{limitDate}, confirmed_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
